examples.example: 他轻轻地关上房门，生怕吵醒了正在睡觉的家人。

translate.english: He gently closed the door for fear of waking up the family members who were sleeping.

examples.example: 我缓缓地关上书本，开始了一天的美好生活。

translate.english: I slowly closed the book and started a beautiful day of life.

examples.example: 每当天黑时，我总会轻轻地关上窗户，准备进入甜美的梦乡。

translate.english: Whenever it gets dark, I always gently close the window and prepare to enter the sweet dreamland.
